featured.text: Terrence Power, for example, complained that after his wife learned she had Wegener’s disease, an uncommon disorder of the immune system, they found it difficult to refuse testing recommended by her physician.

Laughter, too, has a beneficial effect on our immune system, (38) the production of white blood cells and increasing our resistance to infection.(39) makes a difference to our appearance, too, when we relax our facial muscles!
Some—especially the elderly and those with weak immune systems—die.

definition.zh_def: 免疫的，指身體對疾病或感染的抵抗能力。
definition.en_def: Having the ability to resist a particular infection or toxin.
definition.example: Vaccination can help make you immune to certain diseases.
